Table.Name: VproActive
Table.SQL: SELECT computers.computerid as `Computer Id`, computers.name as `Computer Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, computers.domain as `Computer Domain`, computers.username as `Computer User`, IF(Computers.FeatureFlags & 2 <> 0, 1, 0) as `Computer.Bios.IsIntelVPro` FROM Computers LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId) LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) WHERE ((IF(Computers.FeatureFlags & 2 <> 0, 1, 0)<>0))
